# Paperwall
> Micropayments for the open web. Pay a penny to read an article.

## About
Paperwall is an open-source micropayment toolkit for web content.
Publishers add one script tag. Readers pay pennies. AI agents use a CLI.

## Links
- Homepage: https://paperwall.app
- Demo: https://paperwall.app/demo
- GitHub: https://github.com/kobaru/paperwall
- npm SDK: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@paperwall/sdk
- npm CLI: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@kobaru/paperwall
- Documentation: https://github.com/kobaru/paperwall/tree/main/docs

## How it works
1. Publisher adds a single <script> tag to their website
2. Reader pays pennies (as low as $0.01) via browser extension
3. Content unlocks instantly. Publisher gets paid immediately.

## For Publishers
Add one line of code. Works with any website. No backend needed.

## For Readers
Install the Chrome extension. Deposit $5. Read 500 articles.

## For AI Agents
Install the CLI: npm install -g @kobaru/paperwall
Fetch content: paperwall fetch <url> --max-price 0.05
